term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - calibration sample in analysis
term.title: calibration sample

item.text: The test portion or test solution used for calibration of an analytical procedure. The calibration sample is normally of known weight or volume and is prepared according to specifications.

sources.item: PAC, 1989, 61, 1657. 'Nomenclature for automated and mechanised analysis (Recommendations 1989)' on page 1660 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198961091657)
